item.crystallinenovelty.purity_charm.use: You feel freed of all effects laid on you...
item.crystallinenovelty.purity_charm.des: This charm radiates a cool, warding aura.
item.crystallinenovelty.heal_charm.desc: This charm radiates a warm, rejuvenating aura.
item.crystallinenovelty.gooseberries.use: The berries have helped heal critical wounds...
The berries could be much more useful when wounded...
item.crystallinenovelty.gooseberries.des: This berry seems very refreshing in a pinch.
item.crystallinenovelty.crystal_dagger.u: You begin to feel stronger due to the Crystal Dagger...
item.crystallinenovelty.crystal_dagger.d: This dagger makes your veins flow with power.
